response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at a special price. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
